meta.title: Emelly Beatriz | Frontend Developer - Project Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of Emelly Beatriz, a frontend developer passionate about technology and design. Explore my projects in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python and see how I transform ideas into functional and aesthetic digital solutions.
meta.keywords: Frontend Developer, Portfolio, Emelly Beatriz, Web Developer, Projects, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, UI/UX
meta.ogDescription: Explore the projects of Emelly Beatriz, a frontend developer who creates creative and functional digital solutions.

home.intro1: , my job is to transform complex challenges into digital solutions that unite usability, aesthetics, and functionality. âœ¨
home.intro2: Guided by a passion for technology and design, I turn sketches into memorable experiences that generate real impact for those who use them.
home.intro3: Explore my projects and see how each idea comes to life in code! ðŸ’»

project0.title: History of the Android Mascot
project0.description: A project that explores the history of the Android mascot, developed with HTML and CSS. This project presents a visual narrative about the evolution of the iconic mascot of the Android operating system.

project1.title: Modern Cordel
project1.description: A Modern Cordel project developed with HTML and CSS, presenting a contemporary approach to traditional cordel literature.

project2.title: Simple Calculator
project2.description: A simple calculator developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allowing basic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

project3.title: Calculator
project3.description: A simple calculator developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allowing users to perform basic mathematical operations intuitively and quickly.

project4.title: Solar System
project4.description: An interactive Solar System project developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project allows users to explore the planets of our solar system in a visual and educational way, providing an engaging and informative experience.

project5.title: To-Do List
project5.description: A To-Do List application developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to add and remove tasks, providing a simple and effective way to manage their daily activities.

project6.title: BMI Calculator
project6.description: A simple and functional BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This tool allows users to enter their weight and height to calculate their BMI, providing a quick and easy assessment of their body condition.

project7.title: Netflix Replica
project7.description: A high-fidelity model of the Netflix interface, developed with only HTML and CSS. This project focuses on visually reproducing the platform's layout and design, providing a visual experience similar to the original, without interactive functionalities.

project8.title: Stopwatch
project8.description: A simple stopwatch developed with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, allowing users to start, pause, and reset the time.

project9.title: CPF Validator
project9.description: A simple tool built with pure JavaScript to validate CPF numbers based on the official algorithm.

project10.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors Game
project10.description: An interactive Rock, Paper, Scissors game developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript where users can play against the computer, testing their skills and luck.

project11.alt: Dashboard for salary analysis in the data area
project11.title: Salary Analysis Dashboard for the Data Field
project11.description: An interactive dashboard built with Python and Streamlit to explore and analyze salary data in the Data Science field, based on data collected in recent years.

project12.title: Professional Portfolio
project12.description: Portfolio page developed to showcase my career and projects. Created with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it includes light/dark mode and responsive design for a pleasant experience.

project13.title: Java Bank
project13.description: Java banking system for managing accounts, portfolios, and investments. Allows you to create accounts, make transfers, invest, check balances, and view transaction history. Focused on OOP best practices, exception handling, and modular architecture.

skills.noSkills: No skills found for this category.

footer.aboutText: Made it to the end? Awesome! If my work has sparked your interest, let's not stop here. Connect with me to create something amazing together.
